segments.text: Hi ! Do you know what's for dinner ? I'm starving !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're on our own tonight . Dad's taking mom out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Out ? What do you mean out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , on a date . They're going to dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep . They said they're reviving an old tradition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean this is going to be a regular thing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right , once a week . Do you want to order a Pizza ?
segments.speaker: S2
